thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Mike Carter
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Mike Carter

author: Mike Carter
title: Mike Carter
text: Let me begin by saying that I am not the most tech-savvy person in the world. I have had my laser for about a month, and the folks at Boss go above and beyond reasonable expectations on the many calls I have made. The laser itself seems to be top-notch quality, and their customer service is as well!!
